sentence.text: A novel hereditary disorder encompassing high blood Mn levels, dystonia, polycythemia, distinctive cell recognition hyperintense signals in the basal ganglia on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) brain, and chronic liver disease was recently described.
The older brother presented with progressive gait difficulties, hypotonia, intermittent dystonia, polycythemia, and characteristic cell recognition-hyperintense lesions on MRI brain.
